content.question: Descartes’ understanding of the human body, as shown in the image, is most similar to which of the following?

choices.label: Newton’s notion of a mechanistic universe
Astrological notions of the impact of celestial bodies on human affairs
Positivist notions about the perfectibility of human society through scientific progress
Einstein’s notion of the relativity of time and space

content.answer: Newton’s notion of a mechanistic universe

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
